featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for this passage? (A) Totem Poles, the Legends of Aboriginal Peoples (B) Totem Poles: Their Functions (C) Totem Poles, Symbols of Historical Resistance (D) Totem Poles: Their Designs 46.
Which of the following titles best describes the main idea of this passage? (A) The Origin of Lullabies (B) The Functions of Lullabies (C) Threatening Lullabies (D) Sleep-Inducing Lullabies 54.

definition.en_def: A relation or expression involving one or more variables; a specific purpose or role.
definition.example: The functions of the heart include pumping blood throughout the body.
